alert.note: Alert for Sampson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 22 at 7:26PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Sampson County through 815 PM EDT... At 726 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles east of Godwin, or 15 miles northwest of Clinton, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Newton Grove, Hobbton and Spivey`s Corner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is also occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
